title._content: Image taken from page 68 of 'East of the Jordan: a record of travel and observation in the countries of Moab, Gilead and Bashan ... With an introduction by ... R. D. Hitchcock ... 70 illustrations and a map'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "East of the Jordan: a record of travel and observation in the countries of Moab, Gilead and Bashan ... With an introduction by ... R. D. Hitchcock ... 70 illustrations and a map" Author: MERRILL, Selah. Contributor: HITCHCOCK, Roswell Dwight. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 2356.e.10.", "British Library HMNTS 10075.ff.9." Page: 68 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1881 Publisher: Bentley & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002466551 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
